description: This is a protocol from the Doudna Lab for preparation of Cas9 protein.
before_start:
Materials

 

TY media

 1 L

Tryptone

 10 g

Yeast extract

 6 g
NaCl 10 g

Dissolve in 400 mL
Rinse flasks thoroughly with MQ water

Add 600 mL MQ water, media

Autoclave (45’, no dry time)

 

 

Buffers 

 

Lysis 

 1L, pH7.5

20mM HEPES

20 ml of 1M

1M KCl

 74.55 g

10% glycerol

 100 ml

5mM TCEP

 1.43 g

10mM imidazole

 680 mg 

 

 

Elution

 500mL, pH7.5

20mM HEPES

 10 ml of 1M

0.1M KCl

 50 ml of 1M

10% glycerol

 50 ml

5mM TCEP

 717 mg

300mM imidazole

 10.2 g 

 

 

Ion Exchange buffer A

1L, pH7.5 (low salt)

20mM HEPES

 20 ml of 1M

300mM KCl

 300 ml of 1M

10% glycerol

 100 ml 

1mM TCEP

 287 mg

 

 

Ion Exchange buffer B

1L, pH7.5 (high salt)

20mM HEPES

 20 ml of 1M

1M KCl

 74.55 g

10% glycerol

 100 ml 

1mM TCEP

 287 ml

 

 

Gel Filtration

1L, pH7.5

20mM HEPES

 20 ml of 1M

150mM KCl

 150 ml of 1M

10% glycerol

 100 ml

1mM TCEP

 287 mg

materials.reagent_name: Please see before starting in Guidelines section for materials.

warning: Please refer to the SDS (Safety Data Sheet) for safety warnings and hazard information.
protocol_affiliation: University of California, San Francisco,University of California, Berkeley

groups.group_name: The Center for Genome Editing and Recording

guidelines:
The protocol workflow is as follows: 

 

1. Expression of Cas9 in Rosetta2 E. coli

  • Transformation (Steps 1-5)
  • Starter culture (Steps 6-8)

  • Expression (Steps 9-21)

 

2. Purification of Cas9 

  • Sonication (Steps 22-29)
  • HisTrap (Steps 30-40)
  • TEV (Steps 41-45)
  • Heparin (Steps 46-53)

  • BPTrap/Superdex 200 (Steps 54-65)
status_info: We use this protocol in our group and it is working

components.data:
Pellet cell debris (18,000 rpm, 30’, 4°C). Prepare HisTrap purification.

 

HisTrap

CV=5mL, FR=2mL/min
Buffer A: Lysis buffer, Buffer B: Elution buffer
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Pellet cell debris (18,000 rpm, 30’, 4°C). Prepare HisTrap purification.

 

HisTrap

CV=5mL, FR=2mL/min
Buffer A: Lysis buffer, Buffer B: Elution buffer
*Save 20 µl supernatant for SDS-PAGE: cell lysate

components.data:
Set-up Akta:

 

1. Turn on UV lamp.

 

2. Wash Akta with water: pump wash, and flow 50% A, 50% B.

 

3. Pump wash.

 

4. Flow 50% A, 50% B.

 

5. Flow 100% A, until steady baseline. Set baseline to zero.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Set-up Akta:

 

1. Turn on UV lamp.

 

2. Wash Akta with water: pump wash, and flow 50% A, 50% B.

 

3. Pump wash.

 

4. Flow 50% A, 50% B.

 

5. Flow 100% A, until steady baseline. Set baseline to zero.

components.data:
Apply sample with pump, in the cold room:

 

1. Fill tubing with water, connect column.

 

2. Wash: 5CV water.

 

3. Equilibrate: 5CV lysis buffer.

 

4. Apply sample to the column. Collect flow-through: Ni-sample loading.

   Re-apply flow-through to the column, if necessary.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Apply sample with pump, in the cold room:

 

1. Fill tubing with water, connect column.

 

2. Wash: 5CV water.

 

3. Equilibrate: 5CV lysis buffer.

 

4. Apply sample to the column. Collect flow-through: Ni-sample loading.

   Re-apply flow-through to the column, if necessary.

components.data:
Purification:

In the cold room: 

First wash: 15CV lysis buffer. Collect flow-through: Ni-wash1.

Collect flow-through: Ni-wash1. *Save 20µl for SDS-PAGE.
components.name: Description

In the cold room:

Collect flow-through: Ni-wash1. *Save 20µl for SDS-PAGE.

Collect flow-through: Ni-wash2.

 

*Save 20 µl for SDS-PAGE.

First, attach column to Akta (FR=0.9 ml/min).
components.name: Description

components.data: Wash: 5CV lysis buffer, until steady UV baseline.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash: 5CV lysis buffer, until steady UV baseline.
Elute: 25CV elution buffer, 100% gradient.
Collect fractions (Fraction size=2.5 ml).

components.data:
Clean-up:

 

1. Wash: 5CV water

 

2. Store: 5CV 20% ethanol

 

3. Detach column.

 

4. Wash Akta with water.

4. Wash Akta with water.

Incubate on shaker, at 4°C overnight.
Next day: *Save 10 µl for SDS-PAGE: postTEV

components.name: Description

source_data.description: Add 25 ml of buffer A to sample.

components.data:
Heparin

CV=5 mL, FR=1 mL/min
Buffer A: IEX low salt buffer, Buffer B: IEX high salt buffer
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Heparin

CV=5 mL, FR=1 mL/min
Buffer A: IEX low salt buffer, Buffer B: IEX high salt buffer
Set-up Akta (FR=2 ml/min).

components.data:
Apply sample with pump, in the cold room:

 

1. Equilibrate: 10CV buffer A.

 

2. Apply sample to the column. Collect flow-through: Hep-sample loading.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Apply sample with pump, in the cold room:

 

1. Equilibrate: 10CV buffer A.

 

2. Apply sample to the column. Collect flow-through: Hep-sample loading.

components.data:
Purification:

 

1. Attach column to Akta (FR=0.9 ml/min).

 

2. Wash: 15CV buffer A, until steady baseline.

 

3. Collect flow-through: Hep-wash. *Save 20 µl for SDS-PAGE.

 

4. Elute: 20CV buffer B, 100% gradient.

 

5. Collect fractions (Fraction size=2 ml).
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Purification:

 

1. Attach column to Akta (FR=0.9 ml/min).

 

2. Wash: 15CV buffer A, until steady baseline.

 

3. Collect flow-through: Hep-wash. *Save 20 µl for SDS-PAGE.

 

4. Elute: 20CV buffer B, 100% gradient.

 

5. Collect fractions (Fraction size=2 ml).

components.data:
Clean-up (FR=2ml/min):

 

1. Wash: buffer B, until steady conductivity baseline for over 30 ml.

 

2. Store: 5CV 20% ethanol.

 

3. Detach column.

 

4. Wash Akta with water.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Clean-up (FR=2ml/min):

 

1. Wash: buffer B, until steady conductivity baseline for over 30 ml.

 

2. Store: 5CV 20% ethanol.

 

3. Detach column.

 

4. Wash Akta with water.

components.data:
Pool appropriate fractions. Rinse collection tubes with buffer B.

*Save 10 µl for SDS-PAGE: Hep-elution
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Pool appropriate fractions. Rinse collection tubes with buffer B.

*Save 10 µl for SDS-PAGE: Hep-elution

components.data: Concentrate sample to ~1 ml. Collect flow-through: Hep-Amicon FT.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Concentrate sample to ~1 ml. Collect flow-through: Hep-Amicon FT.
Leave concentrator on ice, at 4°C overnight.

components.data:
MBPTrap/Superdex 200

CV=120 mL, FR=0.5-1 mL/min

Buffer A: Gel filtration buffer

 

Previous day:
1. Set-up Akta (FR=2 mL/min):
2. Prepare columns:
a. MBPTrap wash: 5CV water, 5CV gel filtration buffer (FR=2 mL/min), in the cold room.
b. Attach MBPTrap and Superdex200 to Akta.
c. Equilibrate overnight: 2CV gel filtration buffer (FR=0.3 mL/min).
*Set end timer volume=240 mL, max pressure alarm=0.25 MPa.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
MBPTrap/Superdex 200

CV=120 mL, FR=0.5-1 mL/min

Buffer A: Gel filtration buffer

 

Previous day:
1. Set-up Akta (FR=2 mL/min):
2. Prepare columns:
a. MBPTrap wash: 5CV water, 5CV gel filtration buffer (FR=2 mL/min), in the cold room.
b. Attach MBPTrap and Superdex200 to Akta.
c. Equilibrate overnight: 2CV gel filtration buffer (FR=0.3 mL/min).
*Set end timer volume=240 mL, max pressure alarm=0.25 MPa.

components.data: Concentrate sample to ~500 µl. Rinse concentrator with 500 µl gel filtration buffer.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Concentrate sample to ~500 µl. Rinse concentrator with 500 µl gel filtration buffer.

components.data: Spin down sample (11000 rpm, 4’, 4°C). Transfer supernatant to a new 1.5 ml-tube.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Spin down sample (11000 rpm, 4’, 4°C). Transfer supernatant to a new 1.5 ml-tube.

components.data: To inject sample, first, clean injection port, sample loop with water, gel filtration buffer.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: To inject sample, first, clean injection port, sample loop with water, gel filtration buffer.

components.data: Now, draw up sample with 1 ml-syringe, and replace the syringe on the injection port.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Now, draw up sample with 1 ml-syringe, and replace the syringe on the injection port.

components.data: [LOAD] Inject sample to the loop with syringe.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: [LOAD] Inject sample to the loop with syringe.

components.data:
Purification

 

1. [INJECT] Apply sample to the column (~3 ml).

 

2. [LOAD] Flow ~1CV gel filtration buffer. Cas9 elutes at 65-85 ml.

 

3. Collect fractions (Fraction size=2 ml).
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Purification

 

1. [INJECT] Apply sample to the column (~3 ml).

 

2. [LOAD] Flow ~1CV gel filtration buffer. Cas9 elutes at 65-85 ml.

 

3. Collect fractions (Fraction size=2 ml).

components.data:
Clean-up (FR=2 ml/min):

1. Detach MBPTrap.
2. Wash MBPTrap: 10CV 10mM maltose + gel filtration buffer, in the cold room.
3. Store MBPTrap: 5CV 20% ethanol.
4. Wash Superdex200: 2CV water (Long-term storage in 20% ethanol).
5. Detach Superdex200.
6. Wash Akta with water.
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Clean-up (FR=2 ml/min):

1. Detach MBPTrap.
2. Wash MBPTrap: 10CV 10mM maltose + gel filtration buffer, in the cold room.
3. Store MBPTrap: 5CV 20% ethanol.
4. Wash Superdex200: 2CV water (Long-term storage in 20% ethanol).
5. Detach Superdex200.
6. Wash Akta with water.

components.data: Pool appropriate fractions. Rinse collection tubes. *Save 5 µl for SDS-PAGE: Cas9
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Pool appropriate fractions. Rinse collection tubes. *Save 5 µl for SDS-PAGE: Cas9

components.data:
Concentrate to desired concentration (~40 uM).

 

*Cas9

MW=158,441.4 g/mol
Molar absorption coefficient=120,575 L/mol·cm
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Concentrate to desired concentration (~40 uM).

 

*Cas9

MW=158,441.4 g/mol
Molar absorption coefficient=120,575 L/mol·cm
Aliquot 20 µl each into 1.5 ml-tubes.

components.data: Snap-freeze in LN2, and store at -80°C.
components.name: Description
